entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Rename UI disappears when typing #60288
  • How are duplicate values in IncrementalValuesProvider handled? #60287
  • CodeLens Refresh link does not work when changes are made in a different project #60284
  • C# compiler should not produce 'CS8618 Non-nullable field must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor' warning with null check in constructor #60283

Closed

  • Hang in MetadataAsSourceFileService.TryAddDocumentToWork #60115
  • Inline Temporary fails to simplify `global::` in top-level statements #44420
    Compiler.Next
  • Roslyn dosn't work on VSIX #57971
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Revert "Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI th…" #60282
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Don't block on clearing the output window on the UI thread when generating a file #60281
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove outdated comment #60275
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Assert window title before closing #60277
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ban incompatible service provider extension methods #60276
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60280
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60279
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60278
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Initialize MEF parts before switching to the UI thread #60289
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Check for reference assembly before deciding which language to show #60271
    Area-IDE
